properties.AmenityLocation: Highway 97 and Highway 16, at Casino Resort
properties.Comments: Drivers are invited to stop in for the Triple S promo to clean up & rest, $20 for 2 hours, take-out/eat-in meals also available to order. Lots of truck parking!

properties.Name: Sandman Hotel Vancouver City Center

properties.Name: Sandman Suites Vancouver Davie Street

properties.Name: Sandman Hotel & Suites Squamish
properties.Comments: Sandman Squamish (& other Sandman locations throughout BC): The Sandman Hotel Group has established special rates for Emergency Services, First Responders and Essential Services such as trucking. Many of their locations have ample parking as well (the Squamish hotel, which contacted us first has excellent parking space available for tractor/trailers). Free breakfast and dinner on selected choices for Trucker Tuesday

properties.Name: Best Western King George Inn & Suites
properties.AmenityLocation: Near King George Blvd and 80th Ave
properties.Comments: Offering a special rate for truck drivers of $90.00 + tax per night for a standard 2 queen bedroom, free Wi-Fi and laundry facilities
